title: What are the AI technologies in business? - Quora

response.answer_text: Logically speaking it is being used around the clock to predict profits and losses. AI can be used to cut down power consumption for more efficient resource utilisation. However, this is just a common use among many type of business. But, the use of AI totally depends on what kind of business you are running. Let’s say you own a credit card company, ai can be used to detect credit card fraud on the basis of data where people are trying to use your credit card. If it’s not your country then it’s most likely a fraud. AI can alert and block your card. In retail business AI can help you know which products are being sold more in x month, rainy season etc. It just tracks down patterns of things that are connected in data. So you can use it in a creative way to aid in your business. Don’t forget you’ll need to collect tons of data first and you’ll require data scientists to do all the maths for you.
